channel.title: CVE Feed for GE Healthcare -- GE Infinia
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE Healthcare -- GE Infinia

item.title: CVE-2017-14002|2024-09-17T02:52:52.873Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20infinia
item.description: GE Infinia/Infinia with Hawkeye 4 medical imaging systems all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.
